name: Bobby BeeBlaster - walk backwards to ghost through walls!
name_original: Bobby BeeBlaster - walk backwards to ghost through walls!
description:
A very short run and gun platform with some intentional movement bugs

controls-

jump - space

wasd- move

mouse - aim and shoot

Lshift - roll

intentional bugs -

jump + roll makes you shoot into the air 

no collision with walls while walking backwards
